definition: Yanzi (-c 500 BC), famous statesman from Qi of the Warring States, also known as 晏子, hero of book 晏子春秋
to drown a newborn baby (as method of infanticide)
La Niña (counterpart of El Niño in meteorology)

pinyin: ying1 er2 cu4 si3 zong1 he2 zheng4

definition: (neologism c. 2017) adult who behaves in a childish manner (e.g. throwing a tantrum)

sentences.english: Just left, Lin Ying baby bump into the village.
sentences.chinese: 剛剛離開時，林嬰嬰就撞見了騰村。

sentences.english: He said such views could cause them 'not to care much about the dead babies.'
sentences.chinese: 他說，這樣的觀念可能使他們對死嬰不怎麼關心。

sentences.english: Yang Fengmao learns and gold deep water Lin Ying baby be vivisection experiments, very worried.
sentences.chinese: 楊豐懋和金深水獲悉林嬰嬰被做活體實驗，萬分着急。

sentences.english: Norrell, who was adopted from Mexico as a baby by a Californian family, had been in Antioch to attend a rehearsal for a friend's coming-of-age party.
sentences.chinese: 嬰兒時的墨西哥女孩諾雷爾被加利福尼亞一家人收養。

sentences.english: Our Housekeeping Department has very good baby-sitting service.
sentences.chinese: 我們客房部有很好的託嬰服務。

sentences.english: Gradually, Lin Ying infant and Mrs Wang mix.
sentences.chinese: 漸漸地，林嬰嬰和汪夫人混熟了。

sentences.english: New evidence strengthens the belief that infanticide was common in the Roman Empire.
sentences.chinese: 新的證據證明弒嬰在羅馬帝國是常見的現象。

sentences.english: Entropy can increase without limit through the creation of new baby universes .
sentences.chinese: 熵可藉由創生新的嬰宇宙而無限增加。

sentences.english: Some studies (Acredolo and Goodwyn) show a connection between signing as a baby, and improved IQ scores.
sentences.chinese: 有研究表明嬰兒時學習手語對IQ的提高很有幫助。

sentences.english: At the same time, Lin Ying infant and other infected children car also being sent to the northeast.
sentences.chinese: 同時，林嬰嬰和其他受感染的孩子同樣車被押往東北。

sentences.english: Bottle-feeding caregivers face certain challenges in feeding a baby safely.
sentences.chinese: 瓶喂的護理者在安全餵養嬰兒時面臨着確定的挑戰。

sentences.english: The corpses could have been those of aborted fetuses or babies who died of illness at local hospitals.
sentences.chinese: 這些遺體可能是當地醫院裏引流產或者病亡的死嬰。

sentences.english: "There's something we call 'cheese baby syndrome, '" Fox said.
sentences.chinese: “有一種我們稱爲奶酪嬰綜合症，”Fox解釋說。

sentences.english: Lin Ying baby give intelligence to claudius.
sentences.chinese: 林嬰嬰把情報交給革老。

sentences.english: No tarmac delays, no screaming babies.
sentences.chinese: 沒有停機坪延誤，沒有哭喊的嬰孩兒。

definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
